title: This is a bad title for a good Idea.
body:
A lot of people are complaining about a lot of champions, and that isn't nessacarily fair, so I thought it would be a good idea to create a place where people that main champions could list WHY their champion isn't broken by putting a grouping of tips and tricks to deal with them there.

My main {{champion:113}}  is getting ~~gutted~~ reworked soon, so My tips probably won't help for much longer, but for the sake of it I'll give some. Her clear is unsafe for her and she is fairly easily counterjungled, but she packsa wallop from early to mid. she actually outduels most adc's when she is even with them with a generic build, so don't let her solo your allies if you can help it. realistically the only ability you need to dodge is her ult, but if you can dodge both her ult and q that should be enough to prevent her from doing any thing productive for a while, kiting her is really easy so long as you don't get hit in the first place, and her passive reduces slowing affects, so try to use those early rather than later.

replies.body: I've never seen somehow call see broken op or underpowered she's just there and unpopular
Still though, I'm sure there are people that hate sej with burning passion. and I don't know any other champion as well as I know sej.
